name: Slide Furry Boys
description:
Slide Furry is a puzzle game, with the objective of getting the cards to be combined, to release amazing boys.
But remember, this game aims to make you relax and enjoy life.


  • Get involved with hot furry boys in your intimate moments.
  • A game for adults only.
  • Relax with beautiful handcrafted illustrations and a unique, immersive soundtrack.
  • Features include an awesome gallery so you can admire the boys anytime.
  • If you love furry boys, play it!! ❤️
